select count(1) from O2OCONSIGNMENTITEMS where P_STATUS='10'
and P_RECOMMENDSTORE=${storeId}
mapper.update: UPDATE O2OCONSIGNMENTITEMS SET P_AGENCYCOMMENT = #{remark}, P_RECOMMENDSTORE = #{storeId} WHERE P_CONSIGNMENT = ( SELECT pk FROM CONSIGNMENTS WHERE P_CODE = #{orderCode} )

UPDATE O2OCONSIGNMENTITEMS
P_RECOMMENDSTORE = #{entity.recommendStore},
P_CONSIGNMENT = #{entity.consignment},
P_CUSCOMMET = #{entity.cusComment},
P_SERVERCOMMENT = #{entity.serverComment},
P_CUSREFUSECOMMET = #{entity.cusRefuseComment},
P_AGENCYCOMMENT = #{entity.agencyComment},
P_REFUSETYPE = #{entity.refuseType},
P_REFUSECOMMENT = #{entity.refuseComment},
P_ACCEPTEDREFUSECOMMENT = #{entity.acceptedRefuseComment},
P_DELIVERYPIC = #{entity.deliverPic},
P_STATUS = #{entity.status},
P_ACCEPTEDBY = #{entity.acceptedBy},
P_ACCEPTEDCOMMENT = #{entity.acceptedComment},
P_ACCEPTEDTIME = #{entity.acceptedTime},
P_ISDELIVERYSELF = #{entity.isDeliverySelf},
P_DELIVERYTIME = #{entity.deliveryTime},
P_FINISHTIME = ${entity.finishTime},
deliveryPoint = #{entity.deliveryPoint},
deliveryMode = #{entity.deliveryMode},
WHERE P_CONSIGNMENT = ( SELECT pk FROM CONSIGNMENTS WHERE P_CODE = #{entity.orderCode})
mapper.select: SELECT c.p_code, c.pk, c.P_DELIVERYPOINTOFSERVICE, o2.P_DELIVERYCOST AS deliveryCost, o2.P_SERVICEAMOUNT AS serviceAmount, o2.p_payamount AS payAmount, c.P_STATUS, o2.pk AS itemsId, A .P_STREETNAME, ROWNUM rn FROM CONSIGNMENTS c LEFT JOIN CONSIGNMENTENTRIES c2 ON c2.P_CONSIGNMENT = c.pk LEFT JOIN ORDERENTRIES o2 ON c2.P_ORDERENTRY = o2.pk LEFT JOIN ADDRESSES A ON c.P_SHIPPINGADDRESS = A .pk WHERE c.PK IN ( SELECT pk FROM ( SELECT pk, ROWNUM rn FROM CONSIGNMENTS WHERE P_ALLOCATIONEMPLOYEECODE = #{distributorId} AND ROWNUM < ${offset}+${pageSize}+1 ) p1 WHERE p1.rn > ${offset} )
